title: New: Oyinda – Never Enough
body:
Brilliant change of direction on this new track from **Oyinda**.

Far more racy than her debut EP which marked her out as once to watch in 2014, _Never Enough_ is an addictive, at times uncompromising, but nevertheless scintillating listen. Check it out below.

Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
